  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Parent's Guide to Internet Safety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung eines Elternteils zur 
Internet-Sicherheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide d'un parent de la sûreté d'Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia de um pai à segurança do Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida del genitore a sicurezza del Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο οδηγός ενός γονέα για την ασφάλεια Διαδικτύου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía de un padre a la seguridad del Internet</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This excellent FBI Guide for parents on internet safety for their children, presents a wealth of advise, practical hints and information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">security</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese ausgezeichnete FBI Anleitung für Eltern auf
Internet-Sicherheit für ihre Kinder, Geschenke, die eine Fülle von 
rät, praktische Tips und Informationen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet excellent guide de FBI pour des parents
sur la sûreté d'Internet pour leurs enfants, présents que une 
richesse de informent, conseils et information pratiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta guia excelente de FBI para pais na segurança
do Internet para suas crianças, presentes que uma riqueza de 
recomenda, sugestões e informação práticas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa guida eccellente di FBI per i genitori su 
sicurezza del Internet per i loro bambini, presenti che una ricchezza 
di raccomanda, suggerimenti e le informazioni pratici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο άριστος οδηγός FBI για τους γονείς στην 
ασφάλεια Διαδικτύου για τα παιδιά τους, παρουσιάζει έναν πλούτο 
συμβουλεύει, πρακτικοί υπαινιγμοί και πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta guía excelente de FBI para los padres en la 
seguridad del Internet para sus niños, presentes que una abundancia 
de aconseja, indirectas e información prácticas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internet</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
